message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am eager to share it. Given its significance and rarity, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This amount reflects not only the cost of production and investment but also the unique benefits and advantages this product offers to someone like you. I believe it strikes a fair balance between the value perceived by both parties. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you require further details about the product.
